response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us due to its unique features and the high-quality materials used. Considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you, we are extending an exclusive offer to acquire it for $9,500. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that truly exceeds expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
